OpenPopoutCommandDescription.message: Open popout player for the current YouTube video
OpenPopoutCommandDescription.description: The description for the 'open-popout-auto-close-command' extension command

OpenPopoutForceCloseCommandDescription.message: Open popout player for the current YouTube video AND close the current window/tab
OpenPopoutForceCloseCommandDescription.description: The description for the 'open-popout-force-close-command' extension command

OpenPopoutNoCloseCommandDescription.message: Open popout player for the current YouTube video BUT DO NOT close the current window/tab
OpenPopoutNoCloseCommandDescription.description: The description for the 'open-popout-no-close-command' extension command

CommandListSaveHelpText.message: When changing any of the following keyboard shortcuts, you do not need to save settings; the new shortcut is applied automatically.

CommandListChangeChrome.message: Chrome Users: To change the shortcut(s) listed below, go to $URL$ in a new browser tab.
CommandListChangeChrome.description: The help text displayed in Chrome to inform users how to change keyboard shortcuts

UpdateCommandInstructionsPlaceholder.message:
Press a new keyboard shortcut for the "$COMMAND$" command, or press Esc to cancel.

Valid keyboard shortcuts include one or two modifier keys and one regular key.

The current keyboard shortcut is: $SHORTCUT$

InvalidCommandShortcutKeyPlaceholder.message:
Unsupported Shortcut Key

The $KEY$ key is not a valid key for keyboard shortcuts. Please use one of the following keys:

InvalidCommandShortcutModifiers.message:
Unsupported Shortcut Modifier(s)

Shortcut combinations must have either one (1) or two (2) modifier keys. The following are valid modifier keys:

ExtensionShortName.description: The short name of the extension (less than 11 characters).

ExtensionDescription.message: Provides a simple way to open any YouTube video in a popout window
ExtensionDescription.description: The short description of the extension.

BrowserActionTitle.description: The title for the browser action button (displayed by the address bar by default).

ContextMenuEntryLabel_PopoutPlayer.description: The label for the context menu entry that opens the popout player.

PlayerControlsButtonTitle_PopoutPlayer.description: The title for the player controls button that opens the popout player.

LinkContextMenuEntry_OpenVideo_Text.description: The text for the context menu entry added to video links.

LinkContextMenuEntry_OpenPlaylist_Text.description: The text for the context menu entry added to playlist links.

OptionsPerDeviceWarning.message: Note: All settings are per-device. If you have YouTube Popout Player installed on multiple devices, you can configure settings differently for each device.

OptionsSettingNotAvailableForTab.message: Note: This setting does not apply when the popout player is configured to open in a new tab in the current browser window.

OptionsSettingsNotAvailableForTab.message: These settings do not apply when the popout player is configured to open in a new tab in the current browser window.

OptionsCorrectErrorsWarning.message: You must correct all error(s) before you can save your settings.

OptionsAdvancedCloseDescription.message: Enabling this will cause the original YouTube window/tab to be closed when the popout player is opened. This does NOT apply to videos embedded in other pages/sites. The default for this setting is disabled.

OptionsAdvancedTitleDescription.message: Specify text to be automatically inserted into the title of the popout player window. This can be used for window manipulation scripting. This text does NOT replace the standard title text.

OptionsBehaviorTargetWindowDescription.message: The popout player will open in a new popup window. This is the default setting.

OptionsBehaviorTargetTabDescription.message: The popout player will open in a new tab in your current browser window.

OptionsBehaviorAutoplayDescription.message: This setting controls whether or not the video in the popout player begins playing automatically when the popout player is opened. The default for this setting is enabled.

OptionsBehaviorLoopDescription.message: This setting controls whether or not the video(s) in the popout player loop infinitely (until the popout player is closed). The default for this setting is disabled.

BehaviorControlsDescription.message: Use this setting to adjust which video player controls are displayed on the popout player. The default for this setting is $DEFAULT$.

OptionsSizeModeCurrentDescription.message: The popout player will be sized to match the original YouTube video player. This is the default setting.

OptionsSizeModeCustomDescription.message: Use this setting to specify dimensions (either in pixels or percentages) for the popout player.

FieldPatternNumberMessage.message: The value of this field must be a number

FieldMinValuePlaceholderMessage.message: The value of this field cannot be less than $VALUE$

FieldMaxValuePlaceholderMessage.message: The value of this field cannot be more than $VALUE$

FieldRequiredPermissionsNotGrantedMessag.message: You must grant the requested additional permission(s) when prompted to enable this setting.

ConfirmSettingsResetText.message: Are you sure you want to reset your settings? If you continue, all settings for $NAME$ on this device will be restored to their default values.

OptionsResetSuccessMessage.message: All settings reset to default values.
